name: Angry Dirts
description:
Casual game in which you need to wash all the dishes for a certain time.

Advantages of the game:
- small size (up to 30 mb)
- free
- works offline
- easy to play
- Suitable for children and adults
- helps to shorten the time)
Everything you need for this difficult task has already been prepared for you in this game: a variety of dirt spots, a plate, a sponge and several obstacles. But do not worry, the game has an incremental complexity: the farther you go, the more obstacles will stand in the way.
